Header2: Discover the power of Docusign APIs and how they can be used in the IT industry.
Footer2: Docusign helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on, and manage agreements.

Card1.Title: Equipment and software approval
Card1.Description: Assign software and equipment to your employees.
Card1.Features:
Docusign Features

  • Remote signing and sending
  • Conditional recipients
  • Bulk sending

Card2.Title: Bulk employee permission profile modification
Card2.Description: Update your employees’ permission profiles and software and equipment assignments.
Card2.Features:
Docusign Features

  • Modifying permission profiles
  • Creating permission profiles
  • Deleting permission profiles

Card3.Title: Employee monitoring
Card3.Description: See each employee’s permission profile, equipment and software assignments, and all "Monitor" alerts.
Card3.Features:
Docusign Features

  • Retrieve monitoring data
  • Monitor API for an organization
  • Bulk export user data
